sqlQuery.name: SequenceCounts
sqlQuery.sql: select oa.project_id, oa.source_id, sa.sequence_type, count(*) as sequence_count from apidbtuning.organismattributes oa, apidbtuning.GenomicSeqAttributes sa where oa.component_taxon_id = sa.taxon_id and oa.project_id = sa.project_id (and oa.project_id = '@PROJECT_ID@' or '@PROJECT_ID@' = 'UniDB') group by oa.project_id, oa.source_id, sa.sequence_type order by count(*) desc

sqlQuery.name: GeneCounts
sqlQuery.sql: select oa.project_id, oa.source_id, ga.gene_type, CASE ga.is_pseudo WHEN 1 THEN 'yes' ELSE 'no' END as pseudo, count(*) as gene_count from apidbtuning.organismattributes oa, apidbtuning.GeneAttributes ga where oa.component_taxon_id = ga.taxon_id and oa.project_id = ga.project_id (and oa.project_id = '@PROJECT_ID@' or '@PROJECT_ID@' = 'UniDB') group by oa.project_id, oa.source_id, ga.gene_type, ga.is_pseudo order by source_id, count(*) desc

sqlQuery.name: GenomeSequencingAndAnnotation
sqlQuery.sql: select oa.source_id, oa.project_id, dsp.description from apidbtuning.datasetpresenter dsp, apidbtuning.datasetdatasource dd, APIDBTUNING.organismattributes oa where dd.category = 'Genomes' and dsp.dataset_presenter_id = dd.dataset_presenter_id and oa.component_taxon_id = dd.taxon_id (and oa.project_id = '@PROJECT_ID@' or '@PROJECT_ID@' = 'UniDB')

sqlQuery.name: Searches
sqlQuery.sql: select oa.project_id, oa.source_id, oa.organism_name, searches.* from apidbtuning.organismattributes oa, (select ref.record_type, replace (ref.target_name, ':', '') as target_name from ApidbTuning.datasetmodelref ref, ApidbTuning.DatasetPresenter dsp where dsp.dataset_presenter_id = ref.dataset_presenter_id and dsp.name like '%primary_genome_RSRC' and ref.target_type = 'question' ) searches where PUBLIC_ABBREV = REGEXP_SUBSTR(searches.name,'[^_]+',1,1) (and oa.project_id = '@PROJECT_ID@' or '@PROJECT_ID@' = 'UniDB') order by organism_name,record_type,target_name
